source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_00<tab>Not all knights are indifferent to the plight of the commonfolk, and Ser Yaelle, one such earthbound warrior, wants a word with you.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_00<tab>キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドのヤエルは、冒険者に話があるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_01<tab>Ser Yaelle, she of the cool and speculative gaze, appears to enjoy the trust of the commonfolk; at their behest, she bids you slay a muttonmaw ogre. The bait is her very own karakul, Sebastian. But first, he must be captured with a length of brambleweed rope.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_01<tab>ヤエルは<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F202AA01 /var>を討伐してほしいようだ。まずはドラゴンヘッド周辺にいる「セバスチャン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874001 /var>」を使い、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874101 /var>」を手に入れよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_02<tab>Take the bound karakul to Providence Point and leave him at the decoy point.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_02<tab>ドラゴンヘッドの北にある「神意の地」に行き、<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8CCD01 /var>に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874101 /var>」を置こう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_03<tab>With the bait set, all that remains is for the trap to be sprung. Hide yourself away and wait for the unwitting prey. Be ready to strike as soon as the ogre appears, or Sebastian will pay the price.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874101 /var>を仕掛けた。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E8B01 /var>」で待機して「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F202AA01 /var>」を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_04<tab>The ogre is dead, and the poor karakul is safe, though trembling and wide-eyed. Unbind him that he may return to his mistress.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F202AA01 /var>を討伐した。「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874101 /var>」を解放し、帰してやろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_05<tab>You have unbound the bound Sebastian, and he seems grateful to be free...and alive. Make your way back to Camp Dragonhead to speak with Ser Yaelle.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_05<tab>セバスチャンを無事、解放した。キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドの「ヤエル」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_06<tab>Unlikely though it may seem, Sebastian has beaten you back to Ser Yaelle, as she informs you that she just finished brushing the brave karakul. The ogre will devour no more of the commonfolk's flock, and Ser Yaelle is well pleased.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SEQ_06<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F202AA01 /var>は、時折、集落へ下りてきては羊を食い荒らしていたのだという。セバスチャンも無事帰り、ヤエルは満足してくれたようだ。
TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_TODO_00<tab>セバスチャンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874001 /var>を使い生け捕る

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_TODO_01<tab>Tether Sebastian to the decoy spot.
TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_TODO_02<tab>Lurk out of sight and slay the muttonmaw ogre.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E8B01 /var>で待機し<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F202AA01 /var>を討伐

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_YAELLE_000_000<tab>Adventurer, I hear you like a good hunt! The commonfolk tell me they have lost a good many of their animals to an ogre. Their petitions have come to naught and so they come to me, and I in turn come to you.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_YAELLE_000_000冒険者さん、あなたの腕を信じてのお願いがあるの。
最近、周辺に家畜を食い荒らすオーガが出没するのよ。
これ以上、奴の好きにはさせられないわ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_YAELLE_000_001<tab>We must needs have a decoy for this hunt, but I would not ask the folk to risk more of their livelihood. Let us use my own beloved Sebastian to lure this ogre out into the open.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_YAELLE_000_001そこで、とっておきの作戦を考えたの。
私の大切な「セバスチャン」を囮にして
オーガをおびき寄せ、討伐するのよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_YAELLE_000_002<tab>Oh, he is my darling karakul─a wise knight keeps her own source of wool. Yes, Sebastian has clothed me since I came to this camp and will someday feed me, too, no doubt. But today, you will return him to me safe and sound.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_YAELLE_000_002……あ、セバスチャンっていうのは、私が飼ってる羊よ。
あの子を捕まえるには、この「」を使って。
絶対、無事に返してよね！
TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_DUMMY_000_010<tab>ドラゴンヘッド周辺の「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2031B01 /var>」(enpc)に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874001 /var>」を使って羊をゲット。
TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_DUMMY_000_020<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874101 /var>」を指定地点に置いて、「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E8B01 /var>」で待機。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>You loose Sebastian from his bonds. Leave him be and he will make his own way back.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_SYSTEM_000_025「セバスチャン」の縄をほどいた。
放っておけば、そのうち帰るだろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_YAELLE_000_030<tab>Ah, there you are, and let us toast to a job well done! I've just finished brushing Sebastian. He will get some squash with his hay tonight.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_YAELLE_000_030お帰りなさい！
「セバスチャン」も無事に帰ってきたし、作戦は大成功ね！
これで安心して羊たちを放牧できるわ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_YAELLE_000_031<tab>Corentiaux spoke highly of you and he is right, I think. There is much to be said of a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who is sworn not to a master but to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> work. With adventurers, one need only speak the end and they devise their own means.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB706_00901_YAELLE_000_031自分の仕事をきちんとこなす人は好きよ。
あなたに依頼して本当によかった！
また、よろしくね！
